Absolutely amazing experience! The team went above and beyond to help us. Our kitchen renovation looks like it came straight out of a magazine. Would recommend to anyone!
Good work overall. Finished on time but communication could have been better during the project.
5 stars! They transformed our bathroom completely. The tile work is flawless and the attention to detail is incredible.
Decent service. The price was fair but nothing exceptional about the final result.

I cannot say enough good things about this company. From the initial consultation to the final walkthrough, everything was professional and top-notch. The custom cabinetry they built is a work of art.
Average experience. They did what was asked but didn't go the extra mile.
Wow! Our living room remodel exceeded all expectations. The designer really understood our vision and the craftsmen executed it perfectly. Best investment we've made in our home.
The project took longer than initially quoted. Quality was fine but the delays were frustrating.
Outstanding! They handled our full home renovation with incredible skill. Every room looks stunning. The project manager kept us informed every step of the way.
It was okay. Some minor issues with the paint job that needed touch-ups.
Life-changing renovation! Our outdated 1970s kitchen is now a modern chef's paradise. The quartz countertops and custom island are absolutely gorgeous. Worth every penny!
Satisfactory work. Met the basic requirements of the contract.
Exceptional craftsmanship! The hardwood flooring they installed is beautiful. They even helped us pick the perfect stain color. Very knowledgeable team.
Had some scheduling issues but the end result was acceptable.
Best home improvement company in the area! They rebuilt our deck and it's absolutely stunning. Used premium materials and the finish is impeccable. Our neighbors are jealous!
Fine work. Nothing to complain about but nothing extraordinary either.
These guys are artists! The custom built-in shelving they created for our library is museum-quality. Every joint is perfect. They truly care about their craft.
Project went over budget by about 10%. The quality was good but the cost management could improve.
A dream come true! Our master suite renovation is like staying in a luxury hotel every night. The walk-in shower with the rainfall head was the best decision ever. Thank you!
Standard renovation work. Got the job done within a reasonable timeframe.
Incredible attention to detail! They noticed things we would have missed. The crown molding and trim work throughout our home is absolutely flawless. True professionals.
Mixed feelings. Some aspects were great, others were just average. The kitchen looks good but the bathroom could have been better.
Beyond impressed! The outdoor living space they created is perfect for entertaining. The stone patio, built-in grill, and pergola look like they belong in a luxury resort.
Reasonable prices and decent quality. Would consider using them again for smaller projects.
Absolutely phenomenal! Our basement transformation from a dingy storage space to a beautiful family room with home theater is unbelievable. The soundproofing they did is incredible!
They showed up on time and did clean work. Nothing fancy but reliable.
I'm blown away by the quality! The French doors they installed open up our dining room beautifully. The trim work matches our 1920s home perfectly. They respected the character of our house.
Good but not great. The materials used were quality but some of the finishing work was rushed.
Cannot recommend highly enough! They saved our flood-damaged home and made it even better than before. The insurance process was stressful but they handled everything with grace and expertise.
Completed the project as described. Fair pricing and professional conduct throughout.
